channel.title: Evernote on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Evernote on Juan Orozco

item.title: Quicky Note – I made a webapp!
item.description: A few weeks ago I wrote down some notes on a Post-it note at my desk. When I got up, I stuck the notes to my phone so I wouldn't forget to take them with me.  I use Evernote extensively, so I felt a little silly when i went to pick up my phone.  But then i actually gave it some though, why didn't I type my note into Evernote, or some other note taking app on my phone?  The answer came quickly, because they are just to darn slow!

item.title: Online Web Apps for private journaling.
item.description: I've started up my personal journal again.  (Yes, I am writing a diary...)  Only this time, I thought I'd try a virtual journal in the hopes that I would continue writing in it longer than a few months.  I enjoy writing and chronicling my thoughts, but writing in a book never worked out for me.  I would jot down my thoughts and ideas more often if I could write from anywhere and anytime.  What better way to write on the go than with my iPhone?
